meta.description: Maximize the annual profit of a wood storage and transportation company considering buying, selling, and storage costs.

params.name: buying_price
params.description: Buying price per 10,000 m^3 for each quarter in 10,000 yuan

params.name: selling_price
params.description: Selling price per 10,000 m^3 for each quarter in 10,000 yuan

params.name: max_sales_volume
params.description: Projected maximum sales volume for each quarter in 10,000 m^3

params.name: storage_cost_a
params.description: Fixed storage cost per m^3 in yuan

params.name: storage_cost_b
params.description: Variable storage cost per m^3 per quarter in yuan

vars.name: purchase
vars.description: Amount of wood purchased in each quarter in 10,000 m^3

vars.name: sales
vars.description: Amount of wood sold in each quarter in 10,000 m^3

vars.name: inventory
vars.description: Amount of wood in inventory at the end of each quarter in 10,000 m^3

objective.name: max_annual_profit
objective.expr: sum((selling_price[q] * sales[q] - buying_price[q] * purchase[q] - (storage_cost_a + storage_cost_b * (i + 1)) * inventory[q]) for i, q in enumerate(QUARTERS))
objective.description: Maximize the annual profit considering buying, selling, and storage costs

constraints.name: max_sales_Winter
constraints.description: Sales in Winter cannot exceed projected maximum

constraints.name: max_sales_Spring
constraints.description: Sales in Spring cannot exceed projected maximum

constraints.name: max_sales_Summer
constraints.description: Sales in Summer cannot exceed projected maximum

constraints.name: max_sales_Autumn
constraints.description: Sales in Autumn cannot exceed projected maximum

constraints.name: max_storage_Winter
constraints.description: Inventory in Winter cannot exceed storage capacity

constraints.name: max_storage_Spring
constraints.description: Inventory in Spring cannot exceed storage capacity

constraints.name: max_storage_Summer
constraints.description: Inventory in Summer cannot exceed storage capacity

constraints.name: max_storage_Autumn
constraints.description: Inventory in Autumn cannot exceed storage capacity

constraints.name: end_of_year_inventory
constraints.description: All inventory must be sold by the end of Autumn
